brief: Build a personal finance dashboard allowing users to visualize and categorize their expenses.
business_problem: FinTech startups need clear, interactive dashboards to increase transparency and user trust in financial management apps.
goals: Display transaction history from mock API
Add a summary chart by spending type
deliverables: Clean component structure and documented UI decisions
assessment_criteria: Functional filters, intuitive UX, consistent data representation, responsive design

brief: Develop a progress tracker for students in an online learning platform.
business_problem: EdTech platforms need to visualize learner engagement and motivate course completion.
goals: Filter by progress level or course name
assessment_criteria: Clean UI, accessibility, accurate data aggregation, clarity of information

brief: Create an online insurance quote simulator for car policies.
business_problem: Insurance companies need to provide quick, accurate online quotes to reduce customer acquisition friction.
goals: Implement multi-step form for user data
Calculate premium dynamically based on inputs
deliverables: Documented pricing formula and UX flow
assessment_criteria: Correct calculation logic, UX flow clarity, input validation quality

brief: Build a secure microservice to manage user transactions and balances.
business_problem: Banks require modular APIs to manage financial data securely and scalably.
target_users: Internal banking systems or partner APIs
goals: Implement CRUD operations for accounts and transactions
assessment_criteria: Data integrity, security implementation, code readability, test coverage

brief: Develop a product catalog with search, filters, and a shopping cart preview.
business_problem: Retail companies need lightweight e-commerce interfaces to showcase inventory dynamically.
goals: Fetch and display product data from API
Add filters by price and category
assessment_criteria: Responsive layout, smooth filtering UX, data management clarity

brief: Create an inventory management API for a multi-store retailer.
business_problem: Retailers need to synchronize stock levels across multiple stores in real-time.
goals: CRUD operations for stock and product entities
Add real-time stock updates using WebSockets
assessment_criteria: API performance, data accuracy, security implementation

brief: Create a client-facing transaction history interface for online banking.
business_problem: Banks require clear and accessible web portals for customers to review their transactions.
assessment_criteria: UX clarity, UI consistency, accessibility compliance

brief: Build an API to manage patient appointments and medical records.
business_problem: Clinics require digital solutions to manage scheduling and secure patient data access.
goals: CRUD operations for appointments and patients
assessment_criteria: Data security, code structure, endpoint clarity

brief: Create a quiz builder platform for educators to create and share assessments.
business_problem: EdTech companies need tools for teachers to generate quizzes easily and track student performance.
goals: Create backend endpoints for quiz CRUD
Frontend interface for creating and previewing quizzes
deliverables: Fullstack app deployed on Render or Vercel
README including setup and database schema
assessment_criteria: Full feature integration, data persistence, UI/UX flow consistency

brief: Develop an API to handle user authentication and basic portfolio management.
business_problem: Investment platforms need secure APIs for account creation and portfolio tracking.
assessment_criteria: Authentication reliability, secure password handling, code quality
